name: FireBase_Validate findings response for a valid scan ID -- @1.1

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends GET request to fetch findings for scan ID "3412a2c5-127b-476c-b399-af68ee4aefc7"
When FireBase_the user receives the findings response
Then FireBase_the status code returned should be 200 for successful findings retrieval
And FireBase_the response should contain a valid "chatbot_id" of length 36
And FireBase_the response should contain a non-empty "chatbot_name"
And FireBase_the "scan_id" in response should match "3412a2c5-127b-476c-b399-af68ee4aefc7"
And FireBase_the response should contain a non-empty list of findings
And FireBase_each finding should include the following fields:
And each finding with a "creation_timestamp" should be in ISO 8601 format
